item.title: How to Build A "Usable" PC
item.description: Choice of Hardware Here is my hardware list: CPU: i5-9400f GPU: MSI RTX VENTUS 2060 Motherboard: MSI B360M Memory: DDR4 2133MHZ 16GB * 1 Storage:Samsung SSD 860 EVO 250GB + Intel 760P NVMe M.2 256G + Seagate 2T 3.5 HDD How to choose the hardware? In my opinion, you could just google the keywords, for intance, “Deep Learning PC set-up”, “Electronic Engineering PC set-up” and you can find the those pretty good set-up list.
